imdb.plot outline: Mayo Clinic and Gaiam help you to combine integrative,natural therapies. Discover how yoga can be used to reduce tension and restore emotional balance. Realize stress-relieving guided meditation, and weight management strategies. Changing the way you live can change the way you feel while going through menopause.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Mayo Clinic Wellness Solutions for Menopause
plot: Mayo Clinic and Gaiam help you to combine integrative, natural therapies. Discover how yoga can be used to reduce tension and restore emotional balance.
